characters.name: Anos Voldigoad
alt_names: アノス・ヴォルディゴード
characters.description:
__Species:__ Mixed Blood (currently), Demon (formerly)

Anos is the reincarnation of the man who was feared as the Demon King of Tyranny 2,000 years ago. He is resolute, stalwart, and invincible. His absolute power instils a veritable self-confidence that is only surpassed by his ego. Because of his overwhelming prowess, Anos possesses an easy going attitude and an unrivalled sense of perseverance when facing any challenge that may come his way.

Despite his title as the Demon King, Anos has a definitive moral compass and generally has a kind and caring outlook. He takes a great interest in the well-being of not only his family, but also his subordinates and followers, and is quick to reward them for their loyalty. He is willing to go through great lengths to assist in their development, in order for them to reach their full potential. Other people may see him as cruel, but his personal creed is not to kill people needlessly. Even if he would never admit it, Anos is very protective of his fellow subordinates and followers.

While Anos is not inherently evil, his chaotic and sometimes ruthless methods when dealing with his enemies, earned him his title. While he originally never proclaimed himself as the Demon King, he has openly embraced it as the rest of the world views him as such. Those who oppose him, fear his power, and are threatened by the mere fact that a single man possesses such power. 

(Source: Maou Gakuin wiki)

characters.name: Misha Necron
characters.description: Misha is a student at Delzogade, the Demon King Academy. She quickly becomes friends with Anos after they meet. Her magic power is quite high among most students at Delzogade.

characters.name: Sasha Necron
characters.description:
A member of the House of Necron and direct descendant of Ivis Necron. Sasha Necron is called the, "Witch of Destruction," by others.  She has the Demon Eyes of Destruction, which allow her to destroy anything she chooses within her field of view. 

Sasha is the older sister of Misha Necron. Sasha has a cold personality towards her sister, calling her a, "defective doll." Towards others, she acts superior and above them, due to her status. Though she does act as such, she is able to respect others and be friendly towards them.

characters.name: Kanon
characters.description: Kanon is a hero that battles against Anos. He seems to have a mutual respect with Anos, with both of them understanding each other. Before Anos was slain by Kanon, Anos wished they could be friends in 2000 years, should they ever meet.

characters.name: Izabella
characters.description:
The mother of reincarnated Anos. She cares for Anos, loving him constantly. She is married to Gusta.

When Anos brings home Misha, Izabella is quick to jump the gun and assumes that Anos is together with Misha. She decides that is the case and supports it through and through.

characters.name: Emilia Ludowell
alt_names: エミリア・ルードウェル
characters.description: The homeroom teacher of the class Anos is in. Initially, Emilia holds no respect towards Anos; however, that changes after he proves himself to her.

characters.name: Zepes Indu
characters.description: Considered a demon duke by some, Zepes is an arrogant student at Delzogade. He is the younger brother of Leorig Indu.

characters.name: Gusta Raizeo
characters.description:
The father of reincarnated Anos. As a father, he cares for Anos and is accepting of his abilities. He is also married to Izabella.

When Anos brought Misha to his place, Gusta figured Anos hooked up with Misha, accepting it right away; even willing to distract Issabelle so they can do the deed, to Anos' dismay.

characters.name: Leorig Indu
characters.description: A pure-blood descendant of the Demon Lord. Leorig dislikes disgraceful people that tarnish the pure-blood descendants of the Demon Lord. He is also the older brother of Zepis Indu. Like his brother, he is arrogant, but not to the same extent.

characters.name: Ivis Necron
alt_names: アイヴィス・ネクロン
characters.description: One of the Seven Elder Demon Emperors created by Anos, as well as the head of the Necron family.

characters.name: Shin Reglia
characters.description: Right hand of Demon King [Anos Voldigoad](https://anilist.co/character/138595) and the most powerful swordsman among the demons.

characters.name: Eugo La Raviaz
alt_names: エウゴ・ラ・ラヴィアズ
characters.description: **Eugo La Raviaz** is the Guardian God of Time, and has the appearance of the traditional Grim Reaper, wearing a long black cloak while wielding a scythe.

characters.name: Lay Glanzudlii
alt_names: レイ・グランズドリィ
characters.description:
Lay Glanzudlii is a member of the Generation of Chaos, commonly known as "The Demon Sword Saint" and a transfer student at Demon King Academy. 

~!He is the reincarnation of the Hero Kanon.!~

characters.name: Sheila Glanzudlii
alt_names: シーラ・グランズドリィ
